data.text: Nnome nka nhyɛsofoɔ kuropɔn
Ɔnnyɛ ɔsetie mma obiara
Nʼakandifoɔ yɛ agyata a wɔbobɔ mu,
Ne nkɔmhyɛfoɔ yɛ ahantan;
Awurade a ɔte ne mu no yɛ ɔteneneeni;
“Masɛe amanaman;
Meka kyerɛɛ kuropɔn no sɛ,
Enti, twɛn me,” sɛdeɛ Awurade seɛ nie,
“Afei mɛdwira nnipa no ano,
Mʼasomfoɔ, me nkurɔfoɔ a wɔabɔ ahwete no
Saa ɛda no, wo Yerusalem, wɔrengu wʼanim ase
Nanso mɛgya wɔ wo mu
Israel nkaeɛfoɔ renyɛ bɔne
To dwom Ao, Ɔbabaa Sion;
Ɛfiri sɛ, Awurade ayi wʼasotweɛ afiri wo so,
Saa ɛda no, wɔbɛka akyerɛ Yerusalem sɛ,
Awurade wo Onyankopɔn ne wo wɔ hɔ,
“Mo awerɛhoɔ to bɛtwa
Saa ɛberɛ no me ne wɔn
